gui.socialInteractions.tooltip.report.di: Mojang chat reporting is currently unavailable. Report rule breaking to server admins and serious offenses to local police.
gui.socialInteractions.tooltip.report.no: %s cannot be reported to Mojang, because they haven't said anything. Report rule breaking to server admins.
This server or player has disabled reporting chat to Mojang. Report rule breaking to server admins and serious offenses to local police.
gui.chatReport.describe: Sharing details will help Mojang make a well-informed decision. Keep in mind that these reports are not seen by server admins.
